name: Rainbow snake (itch) (Solaire)
description:
Minimalistic and colourful snake re-creation. Collect food to see the snake grow and turn into a rainbow. If you're cornered, use the walls to warp around the map and appear on the other side.

Controls:
  • Arrow keys to navigate
  • Space/Enter to start game (menu and game over screens)
  • Escape to quit
